Moeldoko: 3 Kepala Staf Berpeluang Jadi Wakil Panglima TNI
07 Nov 2019, 05:55 by Friski Riana, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kepala Staf Kepresidenan Moeldoko mengatakan, ketiga kepala staf yang memimpin satuan Tentara Nasional Indonesia saat ini berpeluang diangkat menjadi Wakil Panglima TNI. "Ya saya pikir para kepala staf punya kans untuk itu," kata Moeldoko di Gedung Bina Graha, Jakarta, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi sebelumnya menerbitkan Peraturan Presiden Nomor 65 Tahun 2019 tentang Susunan Organisasi Tentara Nasional Indonesia. Perpres tersebut mengatur keberadaan Wakil Panglima TNI seperti tertuang dalam Pasal 13 ayat (1). Berdasarkan perpres ini, jabatan wakil panglima TNI ditujukan untuk perwira tinggi dengan pangkat jenderal atau bintang empat.
Saat ini, selain Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto, ada tiga jenderal bintang empat. Mereka adalah Kepala Staf Angkatan Darat Jenderal Andika Perkasa, Kepala Staf Angkatan Udara Marsekal Yuyu Sutisna, dan Kepala Staf Angkatan Laut Laksamana Siwi Sukma Adji.
Moeldoko mengatakan, penentuan wakil panglima bisa langsung dari Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi atas saran dari Panglima TNI. Pengangkatan tersebut nantinya akan tertuang dalam Peraturan Panglima TNI.
Moeldoko juga menegaskan menghidupkan kembali jabatan wakil panglima sudah melalui kajian sejak ia masih menjabat sebagai Panglima TNI. Moeldoko juga yang menginisiasi wacana tersebut. "Sekali lagi bahwa apa yang terjadi sekarang itu sudah melalui kajian waktu zaman saya Panglima, jadi bukan kebutuhan praktis," kata dia.

Moeldoko: 3 Chiefs of Staff Chances to Become Deputy TNI Commander
Nov 7 2019, 5:55 a.m. by Friski Riana, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Presidential Chief of Staff Moeldoko said that the three chiefs of staff who lead the Indonesian National Armed Forces unit are now likely to be appointed as Deputy Commander of the TNI. "Yes, I think the heads of staff have a chance for that," said Moeldoko at the Bina Graha Building, Jakarta, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
President Joko Widodo or Jokowi previously issued Presidential Regulation Number 65 of 2019 concerning the Organization Structure of the Indonesian National Army. The regulation stipulates the existence of Deputy TNI Commander as stated in Article 13 paragraph (1). Based on this Perpres, the position of deputy TNI commander is aimed at high ranking officers with the rank of general or four star.
At present, besides TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto, there are three four-star generals. They were Army Chief of Staff General Andika Perkasa, Air Force Chief of Staff Marshal Yuyu Sutisna, and Navy Chief of Staff Admiral Siwi Sukma Adji.
Moeldoko said, the determination of deputy commander could be directly from President Joko Widodo or Jokowi on the advice of the TNI Commander. The appointment will later be contained in the Regulation of the TNI Commander.
Moeldoko also emphasized that reviving the position of deputy commander had gone through a study since he was still serving as the TNI Commander. Moeldoko also initiated the discourse. "Once again, what is happening now has gone through a study of the time of my Commander in Chief, so it is not a practical necessity," he said.
